data.title: Ochsner Urgent Care & Occupational Health - Mid-City

data.text:
Why Ochsner Urgent Care & Occupational Health - Mid-City?

Ochsner Urgent Care & Occupational Health - Mid-City provides convenient, quality care for a broad spectrum of illnesses and injuries. Our skilled clinicians are ready help you find relief from fevers, colds, broken bones and a variety of other illnesses in a time-efficient, affordable manner.

Urgent care offerings

Ochsner Urgent Care offers immediate and convenient care. Visit an urgent care for non-emergency illnesses and injuries that could be treated by your primary care provider with the convenience of no appointment and extended hours.

Learn more about Ochsner’s Urgent Care services.

For Ochsner Urgent Care - Mid-City, please call 504-218-4853.

At-home urgent care visits through Ochsner Connected Anywhere

If you have a common illness or minor urgent care need but you’re unable to travel to one of our convenient locations, you can access an urgent care virtual visit anytime, day or night with Ochsner Connected Anywhere.

Connect with a provider virtually.

Occupational health offerings

Our dedicated team of occupational health specialists offers both preventative and diagnostic treatment to attend to your business’s work-related healthcare needs. For occupational health, please call 833-624-7637.

See a complete listing of Ochsner’s Occupational Health services.

Convenience of a neighborhood clinic, strength of a system

When you visit Ochsner Urgent Care & Occupational Health - Mid-City you receive the support of the entire Ochsner network. Your electronic medical record is accessible to Ochsner clinicians’ systemwide and to you online, so that together we can work together to keep you well.

Record of excellence

Certified by the Urgent Care Association of America and the recipient of the Joint Commission Gold Seal of Approval, Ochsner Urgent Care has a proven track record of providing superior care.

Our team

Our urgent care medical director is Dr. Granville Morse.
